ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc7:0.2_0: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc7:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc7:0.5_0: 7. The training rule on raw grain
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc7:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc7:1.2_0: it was the harvest season. At that time the nuns had asked for raw grain, which they then carried to town. At the town gate they were detained and told,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc7:1.5_0: They then went to the nuns’ dwelling place and told the nuns what had happened.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc7:1.6_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized Thullanandā,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc7:1.7_0: “How can nuns ask for raw grain?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc7:1.8_0: “Is it true, monks, that nuns did this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc7:1.11_0: “How can nuns ask for raw grain?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc7:1.12_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc7:1.13_0: the Buddha said, “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc7:1.14.1_0: ‘If a nun asks for or has someone else ask for raw grain, or she roasts it or has it roasted, or she pounds it or has it pounded, or she cooks it or has it cooked, and she then eats it, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc7:2.1.4_0: ... The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc7:2.1.6_0: rice, barley, wheat, millet, wild gram, kodo millet.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc7:2.1.14_0: she gets someone else to roasts it.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc7:2.1.18_0: she gets someone else to pound it.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc7:2.1.22_0: she gets someone else to cook it.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc7:2.1.23_0: If she accepts it with the intention of eating it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc7:2.1.24_0: For every mouthful, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc7:2.2.5_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc7:2.2.6_0: The seventh rule, the training rule on married girls, is finished.
